title: Treating Diarrhea with Natural Remedies
brief: How to treat diarrhea using available natural materials when medications aren't available.
steps: Limit fluid intake for 24 hours initially.
Make strong tea solution and drink 1 cup every 2 hours until diarrhea slows.
Alternative: boil inner bark of hardwood tree for 2+ hours to release tannic acid.
Or make solution of 1 handful ground chalk, charcoal, or dried bones in treated water.
Add equal portion apple pomace or citrus rinds to mixture for better effectiveness.
Take 2 tablespoons of chalk/charcoal solution every 2 hours until symptoms improve.
warnings: Prevent diarrhea by practicing good hygiene and avoiding contaminated food/water
Monitor for dehydration and replace lost fluids gradually
Tannic acid from tea or hardwood bark is the active ingredient
